FuncDef:
The revision-level command configures a revision level for an MST region.
The undo revision-level command restores the default level. The revision-level command configures a revision level for an MST region. The undo revision-level command restores the default level. By default, the revision level is 0.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies an MST region revision level.
The value is an integer ranging from 0 to 65535.

ExtraInfo:
MSTP divides a switching network into multiple regions, each of which has independent Multiple Spanning Trees. Each region is called an MST region, and each spanning tree is called an MSTI.
Two devices belong to the same MST region only when their following configurations are the same:
